hero.name: Ahmed Hassan
hero.title: Front-End Developer
hero.subtitle: I create beautiful and functional web experiences with modern technologies
hero.description: I'm a passionate Front-End Developer with solid experience in building modern and responsive web applications using React.js. I have strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS3/SCSS, and JavaScript (ES6+), along with hands-on experience in React Router for efficient client-side routing. I'm comfortable working with Bootstrap for styling, and I use Axios and the native Fetch API for data fetching and integration. My workflow is supported by version control tools like Git & GitHub, and I rely on Visual Studio Code (VS Code) as my main development environment. I also focus on delivering multilingual user experiences by integrating internationalization (i18n) using libraries like react-i18next. For deployment, I use Vercel to host and manage production-ready applications seamlessly.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate Front-End Developer
about.description: I'm a dedicated front-end developer with 3+ years of experience creating stunning web applications. I specialize in React.js, modern CSS frameworks, and user experience design.

reactDev.title: React.js Development
reactDev.description: Building modern single-page applications with React.js, React Router, and state management

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Creating mobile-first, responsive websites that work perfectly on all devices

apiIntegration.title: API Integration
apiIntegration.description: Integrating APIs using Axios and Fetch for seamless data communication

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Implementing internationalization (i18n) for multi-language web applications

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Work Together
contact.name: Your Name
contact.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.
contact.conversationDesc: I'm always excited to work on new projects and collaborate with amazing people. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to chat about technology, feel free to reach out!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Project timelines vary depending on complexity, but most websites take 2-4 weeks, while web applications can take 4-8 weeks. I'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.
faq.a2: Yes! I offer maintenance packages and ongoing support for all projects. This includes bug fixes, updates, and feature enhancements as needed.
faq.q3: What technologies do you work with?
faq.a3: I specialize in React.js, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and modern web technologies. I can also work with various CMS platforms and backend integrations.
faq.q4: How do you handle project communication?
faq.a4: I believe in transparent communication. I provide regular updates, use project management tools, and am available for calls or meetings as needed throughout the project.
